code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./ItemList.scss';import TextField from'@mui/material/TextField';import{textFieldStyle}from'../../../Utils/MaterialUiStyles';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ItemList({index,data,handleChange,handleRemove}){const[animationClass,setAnimationClass]=useState('fade-in');const handleTextChange=e=>{handleChange(e.target.value,index);};const handleTextRemove=()=>{setAnimationClass('fade-out');setTimeout(()=>{handleRemove(index);setAnimationClass('fade-in');},500);};return _jsxs("div",{className:`list_item ${animationClass}`,children:[_jsx("p",{className:"text_item",children:index+1+')'}),_jsx(TextField,{fullWidth:true,sx:textFieldStyle,placeholder:"add data",onChange:handleTextChange,multiline:true,value:data}),_jsx("button",{className:"button_item",onClick:handleTextRemove,children:"Delete"})]});}export default ItemList;
